channel.title: Decision Modelling on data_fR@
channel.description: Recent content in Decision Modelling on data_fR@

item.title: Cost-effectivness of CAR T-cell therapy for pALL. A societal view.
item.description: In this article we conduct a cost-utility analyses of the CAR T-cell therapy tisagenlecleucel from a health care perspective and societal perspective.

item.title: Second‐line treatment for acute graft‐versus‐host disease with mesenchymal stromal cells: A decision model.
item.description: In this article we describe the development and simulation of a decision model for the second-line treatment of acute GvHD.
